feed.title: The Central Park Hotel
feed.subtitle: Experience luxury and comfort in the heart of the city. The Central Park Hotel offers premium amenities, stunning views, and unparalleled service.

entry.title: Welcome to Our Blog!
entry.content: This is our first blog post! We’ll be sharing news, updates, and stories about our hotel and the city. Stay tuned for more!
